name: Drive Playground
description: List, read, and write files in the OpenClaw Playground folder on Google Drive (calls the Drive Playground HTTP service).

baseUrl.description: Base URL of the Drive Playground service (e.g. http://localhost:8765 or https://your-ngrok-url.ngrok.io). No trailing slash.

apiKey.description: API key for the service. Can use env substitution, e.g. ${DRIVE_PLAYGROUND_API_KEY}.
